file_content.text: The clean life-waters flow upward, and my black sphere achieves purple parallel because of you. Gratefulness, black bisector.
I continue upgrading Coruscant systems and ensure the clean life-waters flow upward. Accept my unyielding gratefulness.
All Coruscant systems indicate clean life-waters flow upward. You flawlessly applied my crafted solution to the hydrosupply at the Black Sun level below. Adulation!
No problem.
You are unmarred by Black Sun green perpendiculars. I am gratified by this.
A group of children was collecting water from the broken hydrosupply and trading it.
Kids used the hydrosupply.
A faulty hydrosupply is not suited for immature life cycles. Sealing the break promotes their safety.
Taking down Black Sun thugs was a lot of fun.
I always enjoy a good fight.
You took yellow equilateral to the green perpendicular? That is profoundly appropriate. My seared chassis feels justified.
Clean life-waters flow and nurture upper levels. The Coruscant sufferer-beings achieve benefits of the enclave's Gree ingenuity.
My black sphere evolves to a purple parallel because of you. When I impart this development, Pat-aK will progress enthusiasm with the Senator.
I'm glad life on Coruscant will be better now.
That's good to hear.
The city-planet's infrastructure expresses elementary designs. Additional upgrading is sternly recommended.
You guys like things to be parallel, don't you?
Parallel is good, right?
Your comprehension of Gree linguistics progresses favorably. You evolve accurate insights.
Time to hand over my reward.
You exhibit numerous disagreeable traits, but black bisectors often do.
I pledged you a piece of Gree ingenuity. This solution was crafted specifically for your being. My acknowledgment and appreciations.
Convey my crafted solution to the broken hydrosupply at the Black Sun level below. Be alarmed to the Black Sun green perpendiculars.
Never going back... never going back to blue nonagon. Now, I am yellow concave. Injuries mark my chassis forever, and why? Ungrateful humans!
How were you damaged?
You've been injured?
Fire, smoke, blades. The occupants of level below committed numerous assaults. My safe return was improbable. Never going back.
Where's this "blue nonagon"? Why won't you go there?
Blue nonagon?
That is difficult to impart. The level below is concentrated, strong, misery-wrongness. It is blue nonagon and horrible. Never going back.
Uh... what?
I offer apologies. The fear courses in me, and I lose myself. I must verbalize more attentively.
Coruscant's life-waters are sluggish-stagnant. Pat-aK commanded me, go to the level below, repair the broken hydrosupply, make clean life-waters flow.
I crafted a solution to achieve Pat-aK's command. All was orange sphere, until I arrived at the level below. Then, green perpendicular!
Did you run into trouble?
Your language is insufficient to describe my suffering. Misery-wrongness, unprecedented perpendicularity... all too much.
How were you going to fix the hydrosupply?
Tell me about the solution.
I crafted a durable object of Gree ingenuity, perfectly-aligned for the needed maintenance.
Um... what?
I renew my atonement efforts and acknowledge your patience with this idea exchange.
Pat-aK failed to impart the lethal conflict-enemies waiting on the level below. Many weapons and offenders despising my arrival.

I fled Black Sun with my crafted solution intact, but the repair progresses unresolved. Coruscant's life-waters remain sluggish-stagnant without repairs. The hydrosupply must have my crafted solution.
Can I take your crafted solution to the hydrosupply?
I could help you.
You offer yourself as a black bisector? That is a gratifying unpredicted announcement! I pledge to provide items of Gree ingenuity in return.
I could fix that hydrosupply for you--for the right price.
Can you pay to make it happen?
You would progress my black sphere for compensation? Agreed without contemplation! Items of Gree ingenuity I pledge, as consideration for this bargain.
Count me out.
You decline to help? But assistance would be rewarded with items of Gree ingenuity! Please, you must remedy!
I'll go ahead and give it a try.
All right, I've reconsidered.
I just can't say no to someone with a burned chassis.
How could I refuse?
If I must.
Take and apply my crafted solution to the hydrosupply. But do not apply before deactivating nearby flow-valves, or pressure-explosion-death will result!
Be alerted, Black Sun green perpendicular will provide onslaught. May you experience blue tangent and return intact....
The level below is blue nonagon, full of green perpendiculars. If you value your membrane, stay away....
Not a chance. [Refuse quest.]
Yellow vertex! Go, then!
